content: Barnes Group delivered a very good third quarter of financial performance with 20% organic sales growth, 180 basis points increase in adjusted operating margin and an 80-plus percent increase in EPS year-over-year. With respect to organic sales, we generated a 15% increase over the prior year quarter. Engineered Components once again generated solid organic sales growth on a year-over-year basis, up 15%, primarily driven by industrial end markets. At Automation, we produced a solid quarter of 24% organic sales growth, as global trends towards industrial robotics and complex end-of-arm tooling solutions remain favorable. Moving to Aerospace, sales improved 30% over last year and 8% sequentially from the second quarter. Adjusted operating income was $43.9 million up 39% from $31.5 million last year, while adjusted operating margin was 13.5% up 180 basis points from a year ago. Third quarter industrial sales were $232 million up 18% from a year ago, while organic sales increased 17%. On a sequential basis, total aerospace sales increased 8% from the second quarter of 2021 with OEM up 5% and aftermarket up 16%. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
